member.name: F:KerbalStatics.KerbalStaticsScenario.onWillSetupNewSite
member.summary: Tells listeners that a new Site is about to be created.

member.name: F:KerbalStatics.KerbalStaticsScenario.onSiteEstablished
member.summary: Tells listeners that a new Site is about to be created.

member.name: F:KerbalStatics.KerbalStaticsScenario.allowVABSetup
member.summary: Flag to allow creation of launchpads

member.name: F:KerbalStatics.KerbalStaticsScenario.allowSPHSetup
member.summary: Flag to allow creation of runways

member.name: F:KerbalStatics.KerbalStaticsScenario.allowColonySetup
member.summary: Flag to allow creation of colonies (No facility type; won't appear in the launch sites lists)

member.name: F:KerbalStatics.KerbalStaticsScenario.abortSiteCreation
member.summary: Flag to indicate whether or not to abort site creation. This is checked after a call to onWillSetupNewSite.
